mdRecord.dcterms:title: Document, Broadside subscription order for "Life and Writings of Washington with Historical Notes, Illustrations, Engravings" by Jared Sparks, 1834 February 21
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Sparks, Jared, 1789-1866
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Printed form completed in manuscript. The top half of the form is a prospectus for Jared Sparks's Life and Writings of Washington, with Historical Notes, Illustrations, Engravings, &c. It features a wood engraving of the "Evacuation of Boston, from a Revolutionary medal." The bottom of the form certifies that Oliver B. Dorance - a lawyer and freemason from Portland, Maine - has paid 5 dollars for volumes two and three of Sparks's book. The receipt is signed by Benjamin R. Downes on behalf of the publisher.
